title: 2 bedroom with 4 weeks available in Santa Monica!
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 19', 'OR Text', '19', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 685 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Junction Santa Monica offers spacious and light-filled studio, one, two and three bedroom modern apartment homes with beautiful designer finishes.', 'Located just minutes from the beach and countless shopping, dining and nightlife options, your home at Junction Santa Monica provides a peaceful retreat from busy metropolitan life.', 'Features:', "European-style cabinetry, Elegant flooring, Walk in closet in master bedroom*, Pet-friendly, Quartz countertops, Large balconies*, Unit controlled central heating and AC, 9' ceilings, Stainless steel appliances, In-unit washer and dryer", '* Select Units', 'Community Amenities:', 'Roof lounge with sun decks, BBQs, and firepits, Resident lobby and lounge, Landscaped outdoor courtyard with seating and work stations, Underground parking, Outdoor space on second floor with lounge area, Bike storage, 24-hour emergency maintenance', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'Greystar California, Inc., Broker License #01525765', 'DMCA Agent: <URL>', 'GdriJE10UTIF']
